post.body: Wow. Any use for a helper monkey?
A slave for what? No use for one anymore? What a disappointment for me.
Know of any dorms that need cleaning?
Followed link to ur site. Great flickr pics. Gorgeous. Would you ever consider using a houseboy? I'm very thorough.
Happy Birthday, Ms. Felicia!
Great magazine name. WIsh you had some offices in NYC i could clean.
I'd make it 100 percent spotless.
Jaw just dropped at Liz Taylor's naked back getting massaged by slaves in Cleopatra!!!
envious of chair
They always seem to look bigger when they alive and scooting around though.
Adding Exterminator-Slave to the menu.
Saw ur website. You're much hotter than Courtney Love. I'll chauffeur-slave or do housework for you any time.
Is it Georgia Jessell?
You'd have a better time being driven by a chauffeur-slave than on the drunk-train.
Hey man. Congratulations, but don't forget your fans. One block-click can put you back to 299!
Get dressed at 11:30?
We grew up saying "scooch" all the time. Greek too, eh? Ti Kannis?
Jaw just dropped at Liz Taylor's naked back getting massaged by slaves in Cleopatra!!!
Cleopatra on Turner Classics. Why did Burton ever fall for that woman?
Chauffeur-slave here, ready to serve tonight if anyone in NYC wants a ride.
